arguments.name: known_y's
arguments.description: The set of y-values that you already know in the relationship y = mx + b.

arguments.name: known_x's
arguments.description: A set of x-values that you may already know in the relationship y = mx + b.

arguments.name: const
arguments.description: A logical value specifying whether to force the constant b to equal 0.

arguments.name: stats
arguments.description: A logical value specifying whether to return additional regression statistics.
